thread.title: Hijab-Wearing Yeezy Model Halima Aden Covers the New Issue of CR Fashion Book
thread.title_full: Hijab-Wearing Yeezy Model Halima Aden Covers the New Issue of CR Fashion Book

author: Véronique Hyland
title: Hijab-Wearing Yeezy Model Halima Aden Covers the New Issue of CR Fashion Book
text: The runway-debut-to-cover transition is happening ever faster these days. After making her debut in Yeezy season five last week, Somali-American hijabi model Halima Aden is already a cover girl, gracing the tenth issue of CR Fashion Book. Carine Roitfeld reportedly styled the show, so she already had the... More »
